Package application

Class ControllerVideo

java.lang.Object
application.ControllerVideo
public class ControllerVideo extends Object
Author:
Enguerran De Larocque Latour Ilyas Tibari Oumaima Zahiri Clement Bourlet Maxime Boichon This class is the controller of the main screen of the application.

  • Constructor Details

    • ControllerVideo

      public ControllerVideo()

  • Method Details

    • playMedia

      public void playMedia()
      This function handles the action on the play button. It therefore either plays the video if on pause or switches to the image mode if on play.

    • eventsConfirmed

      public void eventsConfirmed()
      This method verifies whether or not all the events are confirmed by the referee or not. If so, it recreates the synthesis video and file by launching a thread.

    • openSystemExplorer

      public void openSystemExplorer() throws IOException
      This function is called when the open video button is clicked and open the system explorer to select a video file, then check if the video has already been processed and act accordingly by asking to draw line or displaying the processed video
      Throws:
      IOException

    • pauseMedia

      public void pauseMedia()
      This function is called when the pause button is press and switch to frame by frame mode

    • restartMedia

      public void restartMedia()
      This function rewind the video at the beginning of the video

    • endMedia

      public void endMedia()
      This function is used to go to then end of the video

    • receiveDataFromScene

      public void receiveDataFromScene​(String pathE, String pathMarkedE, String pathResumE, String chosenpathE, double time, ArrayList<int[]> Event) throws IOException
      Throws:
      IOException

    • switchToFrameByFrameScene

      public void switchToFrameByFrameScene()
      This function handles the switching of the interface from the video mode to the image by image mode. It is basically called when the video is paused or when the button (Passer en mode image par image) is pressed.

    • redrawlines

      void redrawlines() throws IOException
      Throws:
      IOException

    • traitervid

      void traitervid() throws IOException
      This function is called when the "traiter video" button is pressed and start the processing of the video if it is not already in progress
      Throws:
      IOException

    • fillEventList

      private void fillEventList()
      fillEventList() update the list of events to include all the important events of the match with their time. For this matter, it uses the ArrayList events.

    • initialize

      public void initialize​(javafx.scene.control.MenuItem eventItem, int[] event)
      This function is called in the previous function (fillEventList) to initialize the confirm button : it clears the menu button that allows the referee to either confirm or delete the current event and adds the "confirm" and "delete" items to it. The confirm item confirms the event and therefore launch the eventsConfirmed function to check if all events have been confirmed. The delete item deletes the event from the eventList and Events, it calls the eventsConfirmed function too for the same cited reason.
      Parameters:
      eventItem - the current item from the eventList
      event - the current event

    • newThreadTraitement

      private void newThreadTraitement()
      This function create and start the new thread which handle the processing of a source video

    • popup

      private void popup() throws IOException
      This function handles the opening of the popup window that is used to draw the necessary lines for the processing.
      Throws:
      IOException

    • setListener

      public void setListener()

    • updateValuesSlider

      protected void updateValuesSlider()

    • updateValuesVideo

      protected void updateValuesVideo()

      private static String formatTime​(javafx.util.Duration elapsed, javafx.util.Duration duration)

    • loadVideo

      public void loadVideo​(File f, javafx.util.Duration time)
      This function allows the mediaView to play the corresponding video
      Parameters:
      f - the file containing the video

    • videoWithMarkers

      public void videoWithMarkers​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      This function handles the change of displayed video to the marked video when asked by the user
      Parameters:
      event - An FXML Action event

    • OriginalVideo

      public void OriginalVideo​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      This function handles the change of displayed video to the original video when asked by the user
      Parameters:
      event - An FXML Action event

    • videoResume

      public void videoResume​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      This function handles the change of displayed video to the resume video when asked by the user
      Parameters:
      event - An FXML Action event

    • setlineB

      public void setlineB​(int[] Buts)
      This function is used to externally update the array containing the coordinates of back of the goals.
      Parameters:
      Buts - An array containing the updated values.

    • setlineT

      public void setlineT​(int[] Terrain)
      This function is used to externally update the array containing the coordinates of the field's corners.
      Parameters:
      Terrain - An array containing the updated values.

    • setProgress

      public void setProgress​(double P)
      This function is used to externally update the value displayed in the progress bar.
      Parameters:
      P - A double containing the updated value.

    • afficherScore

      public void afficherScore​(String s)
      This function is used to set the actual score of the match in the mediaPlayer
      Parameters:
      s - A String containing the score

    • clearEvents

      public void clearEvents()

    • fillEvents

      public void fillEvents​(javafx.scene.control.MenuItem eventItem)

    • newThreadScore

      private void newThreadScore()
      This function create and start the new thread which handles the actualization of the score regarding the events that happened at this time of the video

    • newThreadResum

      private void newThreadResum()
      This function create and start the new thread which handles the deletion and recreation of the synthesis video and file whenever the referee re-confirms the events.
